citations.narrative:
*** According to records obtained recently, the customer sold 1 Eland, 5 Nilgai, 1 African Crested Porcupine and 3
Kangaroo on 4/12/22. On 7/15/2022 the customer presented for sale 1 Dromedary Camel. The customer is conducting
regulated activity without first obtaining a valid USDA license. The sale of exotic animals is activity covered under the
Animal Welfare act which requires a valid USDA license.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
Review of records conducted on June 1, 2023 and the exit interview conducted by phone on June 2, 2023 with the Owner.
n

narrative:
2.1  Critical
   
Requirements and application 
*** According to records obtained recently, the customer sold 1 Eland, 5 Nilgai, 1 African Crested Porcupine and 3 
Kangaroo on 4/12/22. On 7/15/2022 the customer presented for sale 1 Dromedary Camel.  The customer is conducting 
regulated activity without first obtaining a valid USDA license.  The sale of exotic animals is activity covered under the 
Animal Welfare act which requires a valid USDA license. 
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A VALID USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED. 
 
Review of records conducted on June 1, 2023 and the exit interview conducted by phone on June 2, 2023 with the Owner.
